    Bundling Amazon Web Services EC2 Instances Kills Certificates

    Feb 14, 2009

    Yeah you heard me! Bundling Amazon Web Services EC2 Instances can kill poor innocent SSL certificates. I had it happen the other night...thought I'd bundle all my instances....had done a bunch of configuration changes and thought it would be good idea. When came back up. 6 instances with SSL certs all down. I didn't get into too much detail, but has something to do with the permissions the are entered in the certificate store with. So reinstalling your SSL certificate works.

    Feb 8, 2009
